attributes.action: Review in child maintenance for fathers who are part of there child's life
attributes.background: Please review and change child maintenance for loving fathers who are part of there children's life. Loving dads want to treat and look after their children but the amount of child maintenance also paying and looking after when having child/children makes it difficult.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
